thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Hendon (The Hyde) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Value for money
thread.title_full: Value for money - Review of Premier Inn London Hendon (The Hyde) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Gavin G
title: Value for money
text:
There is pros and cons about staying in this hotel if you plan to visit London.
The pros
Its great value for money, the hotel is clean and tidy, food and facilites are great.
Bed was comfortable and staff very friendly. Parked there as well.
The con (for me anyway)
Its the choice of a 20 minute walk to Colindale tube stn or a bus journey if you get off the tube at Hendon. Now that doesnt seem a problem in itself but after a full day in London its not ideal. Thats no fault of the hotel of course, hence my high rating, its just something to be aware of.
